## JsPlumbInstance.connect() method

Connect one element to another.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
connect(params: ConnectParams<T["E"]>, referenceParams?: ConnectParams<T["E"]>): Connection;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [ConnectParams](./core.connectparams)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt; | At the very least you need to supply {<!-- -->source:.., target:...<!-- -->}<!-- -->. |
|  referenceParams | [ConnectParams](./core.connectparams)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt; | Optional extra parameters. This can be useful when you're creating multiple connections that have some things in common. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Connection](./core.connection)
